articles.author: Shane Dixon Kavanaugh | The Oregonian/OregonLive
articles.title: Boyfriend accused of manslaughter, DUII in crash that killed boy, 6, authorities say
articles.description: The man's girlfriend and her two other children, ages 10 and 6, were also injured in the crash near Molalla, Clackamas County officials said.

articles.title: Child killed in crash near Molalla; driver arrested
articles.description: MOLALLA, Ore. (AP) — Authorities say a man was charged with manslaughter, drunken driving and other crimes after a single-vehicle crash that killed a young passenger near Molalla, Oregon.

articles.title: Child killed in crash near Molalla, Ore.; driver arrested
articles.description: Authorities say a suspected drunken driver faces manslaughter charges after a crash killed a young passenger in his vehicle

articles.title: Deadly warehouse fire suspect says landlord also responsible
articles.description: DUBLIN, Calif. (AP) — A man charged with involuntary manslaughter in a California warehouse fire that killed 36 people last December says the building's owner shares responsibility for the deaths. Derick Almena said in a jailhouse interview airing on Oakland …

articles.title: Accused Guatemalan war criminal living in RI faces deportation
articles.description: For a quarter-century, Juan Alicio Samayoa Cabrera and his wife lived quietly in Providence, R.I. The federal government is now trying to deport Samayoa back to Guatemala, where he will likely face charges in dozens of murders and atrocities committed against…

articles.title: After 25 years in US, alleged war criminal may finally face justice at home
